attributes.additional_details:
Some times they happen to be in the right place at the right time but this is rare. 

The biker community has even done better jobs at tracking down stolen bikes this is how bad they are failing us. 

The government and police just don't care about bikers but we do so many things for charity's and other events but get nothing but grief,disappointment. 

Please help get something done about motorbikes being stolen.
attributes.background:
Every day people work hours on end saving what little money they can just to buy that dream motorbike.
Then your motorbike is stolen with even with security device. you call the police and they take details put it in there system and that seems to be it

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition which clearly outlines what action you would like the UK Government and Parliament to take.
